code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware,compose}from"redux";import thunk from"redux-thunk";import rootReducer from"./reducers";var initalState={};var middleware=[thunk];var store;var ReactReduxDevTools=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION__&&window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION__();if(window.navigator.userAgent.includes("Chrome")&&ReactReduxDevTools){store=createStore(rootReducer,initalState,compose(applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middleware),ReactReduxDevTools));}else{store=createStore(rootReducer,initalState,compose(applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middleware)));}export default store;
